revised_title: Arthur Harden's Contributions to Bacterial Chemistry and Alcoholic Fermentation
tldr: Arthur Harden was a prominent chemist and biochemist who made significant contributions to the fields of bacterial chemistry and alcoholic fermentation. He discovered the importance of co-enzymes in the fermentation process and made notable discoveries in bacterial metabolism. His work laid the foundation for further research in these areas and earned him recognition as a leading figure in biochemistry.
